title: Pay the piper
brief_description: A boy and a girl are killed on the eve of their graduation from high school. Anger takes the place of sorrow when their parents discover that alcohol was involved in the accident report. The film comes to a dramatic climax as the father realizes that it was liquor from his own home that killed his daughter and her companion.
